001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.BasisFunction;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.AffineTransformation;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.UnaryEstimationFunction;
009
010@Strategy(Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
011public class LinearBasisFunctionModel<N extends Number> extends AffineTransformation<N> implements LinearModel<N>, UnaryEstimationFunction<N> {
012
013    private final FeatureExtractor<N> featureExtractor;
014
015    private static void ensureValidM(int m) {
016        if (m < 0) {
017            throw new IllegalArgumentException("M must be >= 0!");
018        }
019    }
020
021    public static <N extends Number> LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> create(int m, BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator) {
022        ensureValidM(m);
023        return new LinearBasisFunctionModel<>(m, basisFunctionGenerator);
024    }
025
026    protected LinearBasisFunctionModel(int modelComplexity, BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator) {
027        this(basisFunctionGenerator.generate(modelComplexity), basisFunctionGenerator.getNumberTypeSupport().createArray(modelComplexity + 1), basisFunctionGenerator.getNumberTypeSupport());
028    }
029
030    private LinearBasisFunctionModel(FeatureExtractor<N> featureExtractor, Array<N> parameters, JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
031        super(parameters, typeSupport);
032        this.featureExtractor = featureExtractor;
033    }
034
035    public FeatureExtractor<N> getFeatureExtractor() {
036        return featureExtractor;
037    }
038
039    public int getModelComplexity() {
040        return arity();
041    }
042
043    @Override
044    public N estimateUnary(N input) {
045        Array<N> features = featureExtractor.extractFeatures(input);
046        return super.estimateScalar(features);
047    }
048
049    @Override
050    public N estimateScalar(Array<N> inputs) {
051        if (inputs.length() != 1) {
052            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid arity!");
053        }
054        return estimateUnary(inputs.get(0));
055    }
056
057}
